page.title: 09STU FRANCIS ENTERTAINER
page.content: We interviewed Stu Francis,the famous family entertainer who lives in Smithills.He likes living here because he is close to his family and Smithills is a nice mixture of town and country.It is also close to a good motorway system which is useful for nationwide travelling.He was born in Bolton in 1948.He first went on stage at Butlins holiday camp in 1970.He is often on television.He is the host of Crackerjack and the Ultra Quiz.His ambition used to be to play football for Bolton Wanderers.He likes to keep fit and has already run in 7 marathons.He told us that he still suffers from nerves before a show.It was hard to interview him because he kept making us laugh.
